data.title: What genre were the most silent films back in the days when films were just starting out?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 5): In the early days of movies - if it moved, people watched it!

A 50 second French film clip of a locomotive pulling into a train station wowed them for years.

Lumiere Bros. 1895. Some of the audience was so nervous that they fled their seats.

But as the novelty began to wear of...
